title: France panorama. [No. 71/34]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Holiday flashes: Leisure at last - vacation colonies for children. Scientific leisure activities - youth launches its rockets too. 2. Medicine and technology - an improved tracheal cannula. 3. ‘71-‘72 Fashions - autumn-winter 1971-72 fashions in Paris. 4. Les Halles, past and future - the old Halles neighbourhood in the heart of Paris. 5. Monet at the Marmottan Museum - Monet exhibition.
